name: Fly, Zeus, Fly! HD
description:
Jenny’s parents packed up the family and moved to New Zealand, where they would start their new life. However, they forgot one thing when they left, their wonderful dog Zeus! Zeus is extremely intelligent, and has devised a plan to reunite with his family in their new homeland. He must craft an amazing flying machine and travel across the world! The adventure is going to be wild and wacky, but the outcome is inevitable. Help Zeus reach his home, and make sure the story ends happily ever after in Fly, Zeus, Fly!

Tap the screen and watch as Zeus takes flight, launching him high into the air and ever closer to his destination. Collect bonuses to prolong the flight, and purchase upgrades in the store to help Zeus make the trip as quickly as possible! With extremely colorful graphics, highly addictive gameplay, and tons of aircraft and character upgrades, Fly, Zeus, Fly will have you donning your pilot wings for a long time to come!

There's also iPad version of this game! Check the App Store!

GAME FEATURES:
◇ Eye-catching graphics!
◇ Addicting arcade gameplay!
◇ Tons of aircraft, character, and the game world upgrades!
◇ 7 diverse game settings to navigate, from the US to New Zealand and everywhere in between!
